refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: The GstRTSPMediaFactory is responsible for creating or recycling GstRTSPMedia objects based on the passed URL.
The default implementation of the object can create GstRTSPMedia objects containing a pipeline created from a launch description set with gst_rtsp_media_factory_set_launch().

Media from a factory can be shared by setting the shared flag with gst_rtsp_media_factory_set_shared(). When a factory is shared, gst_rtsp_media_factory_construct() will return the same GstRTSPMedia when the url matches.

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_media_factory_new ()
refsect2.para: Create a new GstRTSPMediaFactory instance.

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_media_factory_get_launch ()
refsect2.para: Get the gst_parse_launch() pipeline description that will be used in the default prepare vmethod.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the configured launch description. g_free() after usage.

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_media_factory_set_launch ()
refsect2.para: The gst_parse_launch() line to use for constructing the pipeline in the default prepare vmethod.
The pipeline description should return a GstBin as the toplevel element which can be accomplished by enclosing the description with brackets '(' ')'.
The description should return a pipeline with payloaders named pay0, pay1, etc.. Each of the payloaders will result in a stream.

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_media_factory_get_permissions ()
refsect2.para: Get the permissions object from factory .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a GstRTSPPermissions object, unref after usage.

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_media_factory_set_permissions ()
refsect2.para: Set permissions on factory .

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_media_factory_add_role ()
refsect2.para: A convenience method to add role with fieldname and additional arguments to the permissions of factory . If factory had no permissions, new permissions will be created and the role will be added to it.

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_media_factory_add_role_from_structure ()
refsect2.para: A convenience wrapper around gst_rtsp_permissions_add_role_from_structure(). If factory had no permissions, new permissions will be created and the role will be added to it.
Since: 1.14

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_media_factory_set_shared ()
refsect2.para: Configure if media created from this factory can be shared between clients.

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_media_factory_is_shared ()
refsect2.para: Get if media created from this factory can be shared between clients.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if the media will be shared between clients.

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_media_factory_is_eos_shutdown ()
refsect2.para: Get if media created from this factory will have an EOS event sent to the pipeline before shutdown.

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: TRUE if the media will receive EOS before shutdown.

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_media_factory_set_eos_shutdown ()
refsect2.para: Configure if media created from this factory will have an EOS sent to the pipeline before shutdown.

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_media_factory_get_protocols ()
refsect2.para: Get the allowed protocols of factory .

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_media_factory_set_protocols ()
refsect2.para: Configure the allowed lower transport for factory .

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_media_factory_get_transport_mode ()
refsect2.para: Get if media created from this factory can be used for PLAY or RECORD methods.

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_media_factory_set_transport_mode ()
refsect2.para: Configure if this factory creates media for PLAY or RECORD modes.

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_media_factory_set_profiles ()
refsect2.para: Configure the allowed profiles for factory .

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_media_factory_get_profiles ()
refsect2.para: Get the allowed profiles of factory .

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_media_factory_get_address_pool ()
refsect2.para: Get the GstRTSPAddressPool used as the address pool of factory .

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: the GstRTSPAddressPool of factory . g_object_unref() after usage.

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_media_factory_set_address_pool ()
refsect2.para: configure pool to be used as the address pool of factory .

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_media_factory_get_buffer_size ()
refsect2.para: Get the kernel UDP buffer size.

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_media_factory_set_buffer_size ()
refsect2.para: Set the kernel UDP buffer size.

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_media_factory_get_suspend_mode ()
refsect2.para: Get how media created from this factory will be suspended.

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_media_factory_set_suspend_mode ()
refsect2.para: Configure how media created from this factory will be suspended.

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_media_factory_set_retransmission_time ()
refsect2.para: Configure the time to store for possible retransmission

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_media_factory_get_retransmission_time ()
refsect2.para: Get the time that is stored for retransmission purposes

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_media_factory_set_latency ()
refsect2.para: Configure the latency used for receiving media

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_media_factory_get_latency ()
refsect2.para: Get the latency that is used for receiving media

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_media_factory_set_media_gtype ()
refsect2.para: Configure the GType of the GstRTSPMedia subclass to create (by default, overridden construct vmethods may of course do something different)

entry.para: the GType of the class to create

refsect2.para: Since: 1.6

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_media_factory_get_media_gtype ()
refsect2.para: Return the GType of the GstRTSPMedia subclass this factory will create.
Since: 1.6

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_media_factory_construct ()
refsect2.para: Construct the media object and create its streams. Implementations should create the needed gstreamer elements and add them to the result object. No state changes should be performed on them yet.
One or more GstRTSPStream objects should be created from the result with gst_rtsp_media_create_stream().
After the media is constructed, it can be configured and then prepared with gst_rtsp_media_prepare().

refsect3.title: Returns
refsect3.para: a new GstRTSPMedia if the media could be prepared.

refsect2.title: gst_rtsp_media_factory_create_element ()
refsect2.para: Construct and return a GstElement that is a GstBin containing the elements to use for streaming the media.
The bin should contain payloaders pay%d for each stream. The default implementation of this function returns the bin created from the launch parameter.

refsect2.title: struct GstRTSPMediaFactory
refsect2.para: The definition and logic for constructing the pipeline for a media. The media can contain multiple streams like audio and video.

refsect2.title: struct GstRTSPMediaFactoryClass
refsect2.para: The GstRTSPMediaFactory class structure.

entry.para: convert url to a key for caching shared GstRTSPMedia objects. The default implementation of this function will use the complete URL including the query parameters to return a key.

Construct and return a GstElement that is a GstBin containing the elements to use for streaming the media. The bin should contain payloaders pay%d for each stream. The default implementation of this function returns the bin created from the launch parameter.

the vmethod that will be called when the factory has to create the GstRTSPMedia for url . The default implementation of this function calls create_element to retrieve an element and then looks for pay%d to create the streams.
create a new pipeline or re-use an existing one and add the GstRTSPMedia's element created by construct to the pipeline.
configure the media created with construct . The default implementation will configure the 'shared' property of the media.
signal emitted when a media was constructed
signal emitted when a media should be configured

refsect2.title: The “buffer-size” property
refsect2.para: The kernel UDP buffer size to use.
Flags: Read / Write
Default value: 524288

refsect2.title: The “clock” property
refsect2.para: Clock to be used by the pipelines created for all medias of this factory.
Flags: Read / Write

refsect2.title: The “eos-shutdown” property
refsect2.para: Send EOS down the pipeline before shutting down.
Flags: Read / Write
Default value: FALSE

refsect2.title: The “latency” property
refsect2.para: Latency used for receiving media in milliseconds.
Flags: Read / Write
Default value: 200

refsect2.title: The “launch” property
refsect2.para: A launch description of the pipeline.
Flags: Read / Write
Default value: NULL

refsect2.title: The “profiles” property
refsect2.para: Allowed transfer profiles.
Flags: Read / Write
Default value: GST_RTSP_PROFILE_AVP

refsect2.title: The “protocols” property
refsect2.para: Allowed lower transport protocols.
Flags: Read / Write
Default value: GST_RTSP_LOWER_TRANS_UDP | GST_RTSP_LOWER_TRANS_UDP_MCAST | GST_RTSP_LOWER_TRANS_TCP

refsect2.title: The “shared” property
refsect2.para: If media from this factory is shared.
Flags: Read / Write
Default value: FALSE

refsect2.title: The “stop-on-disconnect” property
refsect2.para: If media from this factory should be stopped when a client disconnects without TEARDOWN.
Flags: Read / Write
Default value: TRUE

refsect2.title: The “suspend-mode” property
refsect2.para: Control how media will be suspended.
Flags: Read / Write
Default value: GST_RTSP_SUSPEND_MODE_NONE

refsect2.title: The “transport-mode” property
refsect2.para: If media from this factory is for PLAY or RECORD.
Flags: Read / Write
Default value: GST_RTSP_TRANSPORT_MODE_PLAY

refsect2.title: The “media-configure” signal
refsect2.para: Flags: Run Last

refsect2.title: The “media-constructed” signal
refsect2.para: Flags: Run Last
